definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
blank (e.g. for a coin)/unburnt earthenware/semifinished product/Taiwan pr. [pei1]

sentences.english: But people who work with adobe must experiment.
sentences.chinese: 但是从事土坯工作的人必须做试验。

sentences.english: One material that is commonly added to strengthen the adobe is straw.
sentences.chinese: 最常用来加入土坯中以增强强度的材料是稻草。

sentences.english: May be that person who had the adobe house or that old woman who broke her leg?
sentences.chinese: 也许这人的土坯房倒了，或者这位老太太的腿受伤了。

sentences.english: This so-called paint job helps keep the adobe strong.
sentences.chinese: 这项所谓的涂漆工作能帮助保持土坯的粘性。

sentences.english: The quake destroyed mud buildings in many remote villages.
sentences.chinese: 这次地震摧毁了许多偏远乡村的土坯房。

sentences.english: The adobes and bricks were very near, just was in front of our house.
sentences.chinese: 土坯和砖都近得很，就堆在我们的房头上。

sentences.english: This so cold pant so - called paint job helps keep the adobe strong.
sentences.chinese: 这项所谓的涂漆工作能帮助保持土坯的粘性。

sentences.english: Mud houses are submerged, millions have fled.
sentences.chinese: 土坯房也被浸泡在水中，数百万人逃难。

sentences.english: Also check Adobe Ultra Virtual Sets.
sentences.chinese: 还要检查土坯超虚拟集。

sentences.english: They later partnered with the company Adobe to sell their program.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他们与该公司合作土坯出售自己的计划。

sentences.english: My family lives in the village hillside, a adobe dwarf room.
sentences.chinese: 我家住在村子的山坡上，一间土坯的矮房。

sentences.english: The clay used for the body was fired at a temperature of around 1300 C.
sentences.chinese: 作瓶身的土坯要在1300度左右的高温中烘烤。

definition: yaodong (a kind of cave dwelling in the Loess Plateau in northwest China)/CL:孔[kong3]
to build a structure out of layered bricks or stones
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
to build by laying bricks or stones
